Situated less than a block away from Restaurant Row, these West Loop luxury apartments have it all: location and modern conveniences. Lounge on the pool deck with cabanas on warm summer days or entertain guests in the grilling areas with fire pits and seating. A 24-hour rooftop gym fulfills your fitness needs, with a view! Residents also enjoy all the refined finishes and luxuries in each apartment, such as sleek kitchens, stainless steel appliances, plank flooring, and NEST thermostats. Oversized windows flood each floor plan with light and in-unit washer and dryers help save time.

Right outside your doorstep, you'll find a bevy of eateries, in addition to many local coffee shops, Whole Foods and Mariano's are less than a 5-minute walk away. I-90/94 and I-290 are only a few blocks away, in addition to the CTA Morgan Blue line located 2 blocks away. Everything you need is less than 10-minutes away!

Pets are welcome and will enjoy the private dog run and spa station in the community. Parking is available at an additional cost.

Text2: **Amazing Marshall Home for Rent!!**  2045 Yelk Road
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Rent this beautiful home in the country outside of Sun Prairie. Located about halfway between Sun Prairie and Marshall, this property offers sprawling country views and quiet living.

This home opens with a living room with a wood stove to the right. This leads to a fully equipped island kitchen with hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, abundant storage and counter space and an attached dining room with a walkout to the deck. A spacious family room is off the back with views of the backyard. Down the hall are 3 bedrooms including the master suite complete with a walk in close and a private full bath with a jetted tub and a separate walk in shower. A 2nd full bath services the remaining bedrooms. A 3 seasons room and a mudroom with laundry complete the level.

The finished lower level offer a huge rec room with a gas fireplace and a walkout to the patio. There is plenty of room for living, game and office space. A half bath and additional storage space is also on the level. Outside this home offers quiet country living. There is an attached 2 car garage, front deck and patio, fenced in dog run and 2+ acres of additional yard space with a firepit in the back.

This home also features geothermal heating to help reduce your heating bills.

** The 2 outbuildings at the property are not included**

East Side – Patrick Marsh – Sun Prairie HS. AVAILABLE DECEMBER 15TH!

Text2: Must See Third Ward Penthouse!!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Contact info:Matt Kivlin | Residential Renters |  show contact info
  Third Ward Multi-Level Luxury Penthouse, Exposed Cream City Brick, Soaring Raw Beamed Ceilings, Rooftop Terrace, Private Garage Parking!$4,244/mo KEY FEATURESBedrooms:  2 BedBathrooms:  2.5 BathParking: Garage Lease Duration:  1 Year (See Details Below)Deposit:  $4,244Pets Policy: Ok Laundry:  In UnitProperty Type:  Condo DESCRIPTIONThis Third Ward, custom-designed penthouse apartment, with a rooftop terrace is exactly what Third Ward living in Milwaukee is all about. The 2,200 sqft apartment sits atop the corner of Chicago and Broadway offering skyline views of the city and water. The two-story unit has two bedrooms, two full bathrooms and one partial bathroom. The Premium interior has an open concept style and includes a high-end kitchen, fully equipped spa quality luxury bathrooms, and a custom iron staircase that leads up to a loft.RENTAL FEATURESLiving roomHardwood FloorsStainless Steel AppliancesGas StoveRange / OvenRefrigeratorMicrowaveDishwasherConcrete Look Quartz CountersCream City BrickCentral A/CHeat: Forced AirRaw Timber Exposed CeilingsIn-Unit Washer/DryerOpen Concept LayoutFloor to ceiling new windows w/ City ViewsCOMMUNITY FEATURESMilwaukee’s Historic Third Ward district is a fascinating and architecturally impressive commercial, arts, and residential area with a wealth of creative businesses and artists. Located at the mouth of the Milwaukee river, this former warehouse district has become a booming mixed-use area with a lot of charm.

Located just south of downtown, the Historic Third Ward is on a short peninsula wedged between the convergence of the Milwaukee and Kinnickinnick rivers into Lake Michigan and is adjacent to Milwaukee’s famous Summerfest grounds.

The neighborhood is home to award-winning restaurants, the Milwaukee Institute of Art and Design, dozens of galleries, and unique specialty stores. In 2005, the Milwaukee Public Market opened its doors, showcasing dozens of vendors and artisan culinary specialists.LEASE TERMSTenant pays all utilities7-12 month leases available. Text2: Stunning Minimalist 3BR Gem - Prime Area | Furnished Housing
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The Brick + Oak is an extraordinary, sun-filled minimalist flat featuring beautiful exposed brick walls, exquisite wall-to-wall oak hardwood floors, an all-stainless kitchen with granite countertops, renovated bathrooms with premium stainless fixtures, vaulted ceilings, and gorgeous bay windows.  Located in the heart of one of the nation's top neighborhoods, the historic Central West End, you'll be just steps from Forest Park, Barnes-Jewish hospital, and the incredible, world-renowned nightlife.  The booking rate you see below covers all utilities and even includes complementary Netflix-no need to waste your time setting up services, we've got you covered.

☆☆Brick+Oak Highlights☆☆

☆The Central West End ☆ One of the Nation's Top 10 Neighborhoods ☆

The neighborhood is absolutely incredible and exceptionally walkable.  Forest Park, considered one of the nation's greatest urban public parks, is just down the street.  Looking for upscale dining or a cozy coffeehouse?  A great bookshop or contemporary boutique?  World-class art gallery or live music?  You'll find it all here, nestled among eye-catching public artwork and stunning turn-of-the-century homes.  Come see why the American Planning Association named the Central West End one of the nation’s top 10 neighborhoods.

☆Bedrooms☆

Each of the 3 stunning bedrooms are illuminated with Edison lighting over exposed brick walls and feature the artwork of the Dutch post-impressionist Vincent Van Gogh.  Each bedroom is equipped with a comfortable high-end queen bed with high-quality, 100% cotton sheets.  

Bedroom One has an en suite, renovated bathroom with stainless fixtures.  It's equipped with ample closet space, an organizer for folded clothing and other items, and a full-length mirror.  The painting is Van Gogh's "The Bedroom".

Bedroom Two features Baronet dresser and end tables.  It's equipped with a spacious walk-in closet with in-closet lighting, a full-length mirror, and gorgeous bay windows.  The painting is Van Gogh's "The Yellow House".

Bedroom Three features an en suite workspace that overlooks tree-lined McPherson Avenue.  It's equipped with ample closet space, shelving for folded clothing and other items, a full-length mirror, and gorgeous bay windows.  The painting is Van Gogh's Olive Trees.

☆Kitchen☆

The full kitchen features a stainless steel refrigerator, stove, oven, dishwasher, and microwave, granite countertops, a gorgeous mid-century dining table with 4 chairs, and Edison lighting over exposed brick walls.  The kitchen comes chef-ready, with pots and pans, dishes, glasses, utensils, and basic condiments like salt, pepper, and oil provided free of charge.  We also provide our guests with an assortment of complimentary teas, coffee, and purified Brita water.  

☆Living Room☆

The sun-filled living room features bay windows overlooking a beautiful courtyard.  The design is elegant and minimalist, with a cozy sofa flanked by two stylish armchairs.  Should you require an additional bed, the sofa swiftly and easily converts to a queen bed, and we provide the linens.  The living room is also equipped with a 50" flat screen, 4K Smart TV with complimentary Netflix.  

☆Bathrooms☆

The two newly remodeled bathrooms feature tiled walls with premium stainless fixtures and granite countertops.  The bathroom is stocked with complimentary, high-quality, all-natural artisan shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hand soap from Beekman 1802.  The bathrooms are stocked with fresh towels for your stay. 

☆Laundry☆

The laundry area features in-unit, full-size washer and dryer.  We provide laundry detergent and other supplies free of charge..

☆Walk Score☆

Brick+Oak has a Walk Score of 88, or 'Very Walkable'.

✓✓Other Things to Note✓✓

✓ Parking

The Central West End is a very popular neighborhood, and while free street parking is somewhat limited, there are usually sufficient spots available on McPherson Ave (right in front of the building) for our guests.  


✓ Pets

Bringing your furry friends?  We're pet friendly!  We charge a small premium of $95/month for up to 2 pets (cats or dogs up to 50lbs).  Just let us know in your greeting message whether you'll be bringing pets

✓ More Great Listings

I have other fantastic listings up now, so check those out too!  Send us a message with your dates for a list of great available properties.

✓ About Us

This listing is managed by Squared LLC, a St. Louis based, Missouri registered company. Missouri License No. LC001564930. We're an Airbnb superhost with a 4.8 rating catering primarily to long-term corporate guests. Reply to this post to book directly and get the rates above (typically $300-400 less than our Airbnb rate).  Below are some public reviews from our guests:

"Brandon's place is stunning! From the well appointed decor to the linens, everything is in place and labeled so there is no confusion. Everything works well, is sparkling clean and comfortable. The location is just a short walk away from many eateries and shops and it's only a short drive or Uber to the Arch and downtown. Brandon is a top notch host and is super helpful if you need anything during your stay. If you're coming to St Louis, I highly recommend you consider Brandon's place, you won't regret it!"

-Johnny from Cookeville, Tennessee

"First time staying at an Airbnb and the check-in and check-out process was easy to follow. Brandon provided great instructions. Great location, very clean, and spacious apartment."

-Eliana from Gainesville, Virginia

"This my first AIRBNB. I was sort of nervous getting in a city I am not familiar with and using a self check-in lock box, but the instructions that Brandon sent over were very easy to utilize. Space was much more open and roomy than the pictures in the advert portrayed. I felt right at home. The house smelled wonderful and the linens and sheets were clean. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was hot. It was nice to be able to do laundry before I hit the road again. The apartment was a 10 min walk to all the great restaurants on Grand. There was even a marathon that went by the front door one of the days I stayed there. What an unexpected surprise story to tell my friends about my awesome trip. This will be my home away from home anytime I am in STL."

-Sean from Kansas City, Kansas

"We stayed at Brandon’s place twice and it was great both times. Very clean in a great location. We’d stay there again!"

-Rachel from San Francisco, California

"This was my first time using Airbnb and without a doubt Brandon made it a outstanding experience. I will be using him for all my trips to St. Louis"

-Matthew from Perryville, Missouri

"Check in was super easy and the parking spot was very convenient. If I found myself in Saint Louis again I would for sure stay at Brandon’s place again."

-Caleigh from Chicago, Illinois

"Surprised the placed looked just as nice as the photos!! Everything worked great and about 5-10 minutes from a lot of things to do"

Brian from Tampa, Florida

"The location was very central to everything we needed. We were a group of 5 with two dogs and this place accommodated us perfectly. Quiet with many safety features. Brandon is an outstanding host, he was very quick to respond and very personable. All in all our stay was excellent!"

-Lisa from Kansas City, Missouri

"The place was very clean has great value. Good location and close (no more than 15 minutes) to everything in town."

-Jonathon from Tampa, Florida

"Super easy to check in & out, spotlessly clean, and cozy. Would stay here again!"

-Haley from Chicago, Illinois

"Great spot. Brandon’s apartment is is spacious,stylish and comfortable. What more could you want ? Food? There are two restaurants well within walking distances. You’ll also find a few local markets and a grocer equally as close. The night life is a short drive/Uber away. An amazing historical park for you and your fur baby to walk at the end of the street. I also appreciated Brandon being mindful of my work schedule when he checked in. Amazing host!"

Tim from New Orleans, Louisiana

When you want to be in the city’s preeminent work hard/play hard neighborhood, and be right in the middle of it all, you want to live here. Go one block in either direction and you’ll find Pops for Champagne, Nordstrom, RPM Italian and Rock Bottom Brewery. On-site, you’ll have your own Jewel grocery store and Bed Bath & Beyond, with the CTA Red Line right across the street. Some recently upgraded units also include premium hardwood cabinets and engineered hardwood throughout the main living spaces. Central air and large walk-in closets round out each of these amazing units right in the heart of the action.

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats and dogs are accepted throughout (dog breed restrictions apply but there is no weight limit).

Text2: ***RARELY AVAILABLE FOX POINT WATERFRONT HOUSE*** Available 12/1/22
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
***RARELY AVAILABLE FOX POINT WATERFRONT HOUSE***

Waterfront! Waterfront! Waterfront!  

Enjoy picturesque views and resort style living year-round in this fabulous Fox Point colonial home with a spectacular lakefront setting and incredible views throughout. Great floor plan provides ample space for entertaining and family fun with generously sized living & dining rooms each with beautiful hardwood floors and bay windows. Family room is a perfect gathering space with cozy fireplace, peaceful lake views and sliders to the oversized rear deck. A sunny eating area opens to the kitchen where meal prep is a breeze with plenty of cabinet & counter space, double oven and large pantry closet. A half bath and laundry room with garage access complete the main level. 

The sprawling second floor features a huge primary bedroom with ensuite bath and walk-in closet. Three spacious secondary bedrooms and hall bath with double sinks round out this well-appointed space. Finished lower level is a great hangout for all ages with enormous rec room, office/den and tons of storage. Step outside and head to the lake where you can fish, swim, paddle board, canoe or strap on your skates for winter fun. 

Oversized 2.5 car garage with stairs to attic storage area! Enjoy the Fox Point lifestyle with community pool, tennis courts and social activities. Conveniently located close to school, downtown Barrington, train, shopping and restaurants. Your waterfront oasis awaits!

$4,800/month. $1,000 security deposit.

A great deal in the most talked-about new building in St. Louis! I'm offering my apartment for December 1 to May 31 at a total savings of $3,030 to $5,430 from what you would pay for a six-month lease for any comparable unit with the Forest Park view that is now available through the building's Leasing Office. AND NO SECURITY DEPOSIT!!! Currently there is a long waiting list for reserved parking in the building's parking garage, but you can also assume my parking lease on a reserved garage space for $225 per month and avoid the wait list. The space is adjacent to the elevators that will take you directly to your front door. 

You'll be looking from the 33rd floor through 35 feet of floor-to-ceiling windows onto a spectacular 180+ degree view of Forest Park. The mansions of Westmoreland and Portland Place below to your right. The Art Museum, History Museum, Washington University and Clayton straight ahead. The Science Center And St Louis University to your left. Gorgeous sunset views, the changing of the seasons--and a great place to watch an incoming thunderstorm. And you will have the option of keeping the unit after the initial six months by signing a new lease through the building management. 

The unit is currently painted a warm, cozy color (Benjamin Moore "Aztec Brick"), but will be repainted the building's standard white unless the new tenant asks to keep the current color. I have attached photos showing the current color. To see what it looks like white and vacant, view this link to a virtual tour of another unit that has the same floor plan, but is nine floors down from mine. The view from the higher elevation of my unit is much more dramatic.

This high-security building by the celebrated architect Jeanne Gang offers 24-hour reception, swimming pool, well-equipped workout room, game room, party room, indoor dog park and high-speed elevators. Garage parking available. Laundry in the unit. The Great Room and both bedrooms have the knock-out view of Forest Park. And a great CWE location! Click the REPLY button at the upper left to see my name and contact information, and call me to see the apartment today.

Live steps from the lake, the river and heart of the Magnificent Mile in this elegantly-designed modern high-rise in the western part of Streeterville. The location is unparalleled, with easy walking to Whole Foods, AMC Theatre, Nordstrom, and countless dining options such as the famous Eataly and The Purple Pig. The options are too many to mention. Jump on the CTA Red Line or Lake Shore Drive within minutes, or grab your sneakers and head for the Lakefront Trail- there are tons of work and play options. Inside, there is an entire floor devoted to wellness and health, including a fitness center with spa and steam rooms, a 15-meter pool and quiet lounge area on the terrace. A resident’s club offers a game room, grilling stations, indoor and outdoor lounge areas and areas for private social or business events. There’s even a rooftop hydrotherapy spa with outdoor grilling stations and fire pits. As expected, the building is 100% smoke-free and has 24-hour security door staffing.

With a focus on nature and relaxation, these residences start with bamboo flooring in the main living areas, with porcelain floor tile in the baths and carpeted bedrooms. Custom cabinets, stainless steel refrigerators and under-mount sinks with granite countertops are kitchen highlights, while floor-to-ceiling windows and in-unit washers and dryers come standard. Even the little things, such as Grohe faucets and polished aluminum blinds are part of the experience.

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats are accepted throughout and dogs are welcome on select floors (dog breed and weight restrictions apply). There is an on-site dog run for your little guy as well.

Text2: 2bed 2bath, avail Dec 1
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Experience downtown living at Metropolitan Place. Just a short walk to the square, this one-of-a-kind 5th Floor 1527 sq ft condo features a huge 1400 sq ft fenced patio that overlooks a neatly landscaped 1 acre rooftop garden courtyard (currently undergoing renovation). The spacious living room has a corner fireplace and the unit is loaded with upgrades throughout, including granite counter tops, stainless steel kitchen appliances, maple floors and trim, maple custom closets by California Closets and custom window treatments. One covered parking spot included in a secure garage. 8 x 10 foot separate climate controlled storage unit. On site management, exercise room, secure package room, dry cleaning pick-up/drop-off, secure guest parking. 1-2 yr lease. 1 month’s rent as security deposit.

The Overture Center for the Arts is a block from your front door.  Madison's beautiful Capitol, farmers' markets, Concerts on the Square, and the Art Fair are just two blocks away.  

Metropolitan Place is also one of the closest class A, secured condominium high rises to the University of Wisconsin.  Residents affiliated with the University appreciate an easy and quick commute to any location on the campus.  Season ticket holders enjoy an easy walk to the Kohl Center or mile jaunt to Camp Randall stadium.  

Over 30 restaurants featuring an amazing variety of cuisine are a short walk away.  Grocery shop as often as you'd like with the Capitol Centre Foods grocery store conveniently located across the street.

Text2: Large Brand New 2 Bed 2 Bath in Roscoe Village
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Extra-wide 2 bed / 2 bath condo with high end finishes including 10' ceilings, open concept kitchen with Wolf/Subzero appliances and quartz countertops. Luxurious master bath features Italian porcelain tile, rain shower and Hansgrohe/Toto fixtures. Covered large private balcony overlooking Hamlin Park. Tons of storage including huge walk-in closet in master bedroom. Full size side by side washer / dryer and garage parking space included. Steps to Roscoe Village bars and restaurants and 10 minute walk to the brown line.

Owner pays water, tenant pays gas and electric. Parking space included. No smoking allowed. 

Security deposit and first months rent due at signing. Pets allowed with additional pet rent of $50 per month per pet plus $500 refundable deposit. Willing to consider lease term as short as 6 months.

Text2: Bright 3 Bd/2 Ba Furnished Unit (Utilities Incl., Free Wi-Fi, Laundry)
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
I have a furnished 3-bedroom/2-bathroom duplex-down unit at my 2-flat walk-up available for rent starting mid-December. The rent is $3,400 and includes...

- Fully furnished living room and dining room
- Large, spacious kitchen with all kitchen essentials, large and small kitchen appliances including a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, blender, toaster, etc. I can store all small electrics away if you have your own. 
- Utilities Included! FREE high-speed Wi-Fi, water, as well as Netflix and select other services (HBO Max, Paramount+) (livestream gaming that uses large amounts of bandwidth is an upcharge)
- Bedrooms all come with closets, nightstands, lamps and full-size beds with hidden drawers for storage. The master bedroom also has a dresser and huge walk-in closet. Master bedroom has ensuite bathroom shared with one bedroom. Garden bedroom has private bathroom with its own living space, wet bar, microwave and mini-fridge
- FREE LAUNDRY facilities in the unit in the basement with top-of-the-line large-capacity front-loading washer and dryer
- Newly installed backyard fence and deck

The Neighborhood:
There are LOTS of great restaurants, coffee shops, bars, stores, music venues, parks and other attractions in the neighborhood. Bustling and trendy Wicker Park and Bucktown is a 10-minute walk or just 1 stop on the Blue line. Walking distance to 2 grocery stores (Fresh Market and Aldi).

Getting Around:
There is free parking on the streets nearby or you can get parking stickers from the city to park on the street. Western, Armitage and Milwaukee buses are right by the house or the Western blue line stop is less than 5 minutes away. Five stops on the Blue line will take you to the loop for business or recreation in about 15 minutes. Besides the train, there are buses that can help take you anywhere you need. And of course, there are also taxis and Ubers galore.

I can send you a video tour first. If still interested, I can then arrange an in-person viewing. Please note that this unit is located in a 2-unit building, which means please be respectful of your noise levels since others live in the building.

Text2: Beautiful 2 BED/2 BATH condo available in River West!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
2 BED/2 BATH luxury condo just minutes from the Loop. Enjoy unobstructed city views from dining room, living room and private balcony. Kitchen boasts BRAND NEW WHITE QUARTZ counter tops, upgraded Italian wood grain cabinets, peninsula island that looks out onto combo living/dining area, floor to ceiling plate glass windows, gas fireplace, vertical window blinds, upgraded SS appliances w/convection oven. HUGE floor to ceiling custom built Elfa designed closets in each bedroom, enclosed laundry/storage area, marble master bath w/rainfall steam shower and Jacuzzi tub. Maple hardwood floors throughout, carpet in bedrooms, video camera security and so much more! One heated garage parking space INCLUDED in rent! 

River West is a perfect location for public transportation (1 block to Blue Line train; 1/2 block from Chicago Ave, Milwaukee and Halsted bus lines), easy access to downtown and all neighborhoods (Bucktown, Wicker Park, Mag Mile), shopping, and highways. River West is located right on the edge of the hot Fulton River District in what has now become one of the most popular neighborhoods in downtown Chicago real estate. The growing community has been attracting urbanites that are drawn to its immediacy to downtown, and has since become a trendsetting neighborhood, home to the hottest restaurants and clubs, and with an up-and-coming gallery scene. Walking along "Restaurant Row" on Randolph St, one will find scores of trendy, top-notch restaurants, like Girl and the Goat, Beatrix and Avec. With the Loop about half a mile west, residents can also easily walk to other hot spots, theatre, museums, shopping, and parks.

Text2: OWNER FINANCING! MUST SELL—NO BANKS NEEDED! STITZER, WI
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hello and thank you for looking at our wonderful home we have for sale.

THIS HOME IS LOCATED IN STITZER,WI.

This home is a 3 bedroom, 1 bath home that is approximately 1044 sq'. Great starter home, even though it is a bit dirty and in need of some work.

One of the best parts of this home is that we are selling it with OWNER FINANCING for 64,900. This is not a lease purchase or rent to own where you pay for years and own nothing, but a REAL owner financing where the buyer gets the deed and ownership at closing. We are looking for a reasonable down payment and income history to do the loan for the new owner. This home won't last long!

FAQ's

1. Do I own the home? Do we have a closing?
We close at a local title company, and you get the deed. You own the home. We take back the note just like the bank.

2. What if I want to make changes to the home?
You own the home. All we care about is the payment being made, so feel free to make any changes to the home that you like.

3. What is the rate and down payment?
Down payment and rate depend on income but getting 15-20k down is not uncommon. Sometimes we get more. We can do a 10-, 20-, or 30-year term on the loan. No balloons and no pre-payment penalties.

4. I'm interested in this home, and I have a reasonable down payment. How do I view?
Email us and we can set you up to view the home.

Text2: Fabulous Upscale 2 Bedroom River West. Hwd flrs, W/D, Balcony. CTA/94
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 232072913Rent: $3,257 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet FriendlyParking:: attached garage
Lovely newer construction in River West. Modern finishes with all hardwood floors. Balcony, tons of closet space, very close to 94 and CTA Blue line and 66 &56 busses!

Just call or email text with the following info, and I'll be happy to help, thanks!

When is your move date? (is it flexible, if so how far in either direction)?
Any pets (weight and breed)?
Need parking?
Budget(just rent)?
What is your preferred neighborhood(s)?
Have you toured any properties yet? (so that I don't double up on my research)
When are you available for a showing?

Springing up in 2020 along the rapidly-growing Milwaukee Avenue corridor in River West, this newly constructed apartment complex is designed with luxury aesthetics to create an exceptional living environment. Premium quality amenities abound including a cinema lounge with 85” flat-screen, rooftop party room with demo kitchen, grills, and alfresco dining, state-of-the-art fitness center, business center and co-working pods, and an outdoor sun deck with a resort-style pool. The unit stylings reflect the industrial and artistic character found throughout the River West neighborhood with a mix of brick and graffiti murals along with creative high-end furnishings and accessories.

These chic apartments have a mix of exposed loft-style elements along with modern elegant touches.  Each unit is outfitted with luxury finishes including plank wood flooring, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, marbled tile back splash, deep soaking tub, walk-in closets, floor-to-ceiling windows, Nest thermostat, full size in-unit washer and dryer and gas stove.  Select units also include balconies and double sink vanities.

River West is a quieter micro neighborhood that straddles the northwest tip of downtown Chicago and the eastern entrance to the greater West Town cluster of neighborhoods.  Location, location, location is the key appeal to River West, as it is surrounded by other popular neighborhoods including River North, Fulton Market, West Loop, Ukrainian Village and Wicker Park.  It is extremely convenient for commuters being about 10 minutes from the Loop via CTA Blue Line train, 66 Chicago and 56 Milwaukee bus routes, the "Hipster Highway" protected bike lanes on Milwaukee Ave, or car. CTA Blue line train station and bus stops are a 1 block walk from your front door.  Drivers will also love that access to I-94 is right across the street for northbound destinations, and the southbound ramp is also less than 5 minutes away.

Enjoy a quick stroll to local eateries such as Windy City Cafe, Pie-Eyed Pizza, D'Agostino's, Twisted Spoke, Opart Thai House, Piccolo Sogno, Maillard Tavern, and The Dawson. Grabbing a cup of joe could not be easier with Big Shoulders Coffee and Dunkin Donuts just around the corner. The beloved neighborhood watering hole is right next door at The Matchbox, and it is one of the most unique in the city as it may be the smallest bar in Chicago, but there is plenty of outdoor seating along side an actual vintage train car.  Wandering down Chicago Ave, Milwaukee Ave. or Grand Ave. you'll stumble upon art galleries, independent boutique shops, craft brew pubs, wine bars and diverse cuisine throughout the neighborhood that make River West a cozy pocket of Chicago with lots of character. Daily essentials are also close by at CVS, Jewel-Osco, and BWS Beverage.

Convenient services accommodate your daily needs on-site too including a front desk concierge, 24-hour maintenance and property management, package service, and a coffee bar.  Parking garage is available with additional fees. Cats and dogs are welcome (with some restrictions) with a dog run and pet washing station on site to keep your fur babies active and clean.


FEATURESBalcony-Some UnitsCentral Air-YesDishwasher-AllDogs-No Weight LimitFitness CenterFlooring-Hardwood OnlyLaundry- W/D In UnitLuxury PropertyNew PropertyPool-OutdoorSecurity-Intercom/Key FobSecurity-Part-Time DoormanSmoking-NoStove-Gas

Live in the heart of Printer’s Row, one of the most sought-after neighborhoods in Chicago and booming with new developments. This ultra-accessible property is a short walk to the CTA Blue, Red, Pink, Green and Orange lines and has quick access to all major expressways. With top-notch schools, easy access to parks and the lake, and endless restaurants and retail options, you can walk to nearly everything you need. The property has a resident lounge and sundeck and a 24-hour fitness center. The building is 100% smoke-free and has a 24-hour security door staff.  

Originally built as condos, each apartment home is unique and smartly laid out. Standard finishes include hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops. Every apartment includes floor-to-ceiling windows, in-unit washers and dryers, and a private balcony to cap the impressive apartment features. 

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats and dogs are accepted throughout and there is a dog run for your four-legged friend (dog breed restrictions apply, but there is no weight limit).

Text2: BRAND NEW 2022 WEST LOOP 2 BEDROOM W/BALCONY IN LUXURY HIGH RISE!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 274597838Rent: $3,485 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet FriendlyParking:: attached garage
Be the first to live in the unit! Brand spanking new in west loop! Great amenities and pricing for a 13 or 14 month lease!
Parking additional at $325 in private garage.

Overlooking a huge historic city park, this luxury apartment complex is on the western edge of the popular West Loop neighborhood. It is close enough to all of the action, amazing Randolph Street restaurants and downtown businesses, while having a little bit of cushion from the hustle and bustle, and a lot more green breathing room.

Steeped in luxury finishes, these apartments feature wood plank flooring throughout, quartz countertops, artistic custom backsplashes, soft close cabinetry with under-lighting, glass walk-in showers, and stainless-steel appliances. You’ll also get a Nest thermostat and keyless entry system, which come standard. 
This property didn’t skimp on the amenities, either. If you’re a fitness fanatic, this is the building for you. It has a state-of-the art fitness that boasts Technogym equipment. Enjoy Chicago’s steamy summers in the oversized pool or lounging in the cabanas. The rooftop courtyard has tons of seating, plus grilling stations. There’s also an entertainment lounge and game room. If you work from home, you’ll be covered in the co-working space that was designed with individual stations and private conference rooms.

Cats and dogs are welcome with breed restrictions. There’s an on-site dog run and pet spa, but you’ll also have the added pet perk with over 13 acres of green space at the park right across the street. Garage parking is available with additional fees

Dan Zager
847-308-8243

Text2: South Loop 2 bedroom loft, low utilities, lg closets, balcony
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 31168665Rent: $3,000 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet FriendlyParking:: attached garage
Various move date available 

Utilities- $120 included gas, water, trash, sewage, and INTERNET (unlimited with high speed 1G). Electric is separate. 
Parking is $240

If you wouldn't mind answering some questions, it will help me understand your search better!

When is your move date?(is it flexible, if so how far in either direction)?
Any pets(weight and breed)?
Need parking?
Budget(just rent)?
Which neighborhoods are you looking in?
Have you toured any properties yet?(so that I don't double up on my research)
When are you available for a showing?

Tara O'Malley 
Hotspot Rentals
License #- 471.003110

Properties like this are one of the main reasons more people than ever are calling the South Loop home. This smart, unique mid-rise combines the best of modern buildings with the traditional warmth and feel of a loft-style space. Situated in the heart of Printer’s Row, it offers incredible access to transportation, with walking access to every CTA train in less than 10 minutes and just a few blocks’ drive to the 90/94 and 290 Expressways. Stroll to endless shopping, including Target and Whole Foods, restaurants such as Umai, Blackie’s and Hackney’s and tons of boutique shops and bars. Stay on-site and enjoy the sundeck and outdoor pool, full-service fitness center with private yoga studio, and multiple lounge areas for TV, billiards, cooking or business. There’s even outdoor grilling stations and fire pits. This 100% smoke-free building is also a LEED Silver & ENERGY STAR® Certified community and has a 24-hour security door staff.

It’s hard to enter these apartment homes and not be drawn to the 10’ ceilings with exposed concrete and duct work. Kitchens include stainless steel appliances with either slate gray or espresso cabinets and designer backsplashes. Hardwood flooring, resident-controlled and programmable thermostats and full-size stackable washers and dryers come standard in every apartment. Some units come with exposed brick and balconies, as well.

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge and there is permit street parking within walking distance. Cats are accepted throughout and dogs are welcome on select floors (dog breed and weight restrictions apply). They have a private dog run as well.

Text2: Large Northside home perfect for roommates or big family
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Oversized 5-bedroom, 2-bathroom house for rent on a double lot with parking in West Ridge, Chicago! Ready to rent to a large family, group of students, or new professional roommates looking for a cozy home-like feel? This home has been lovingly cared for, upgraded & maintained by a single owner for the past 35+ years. This home provides multiple user configurations, including a home office, art studio space & multiple rec/family areas.


Central HVAC updates this 100+ y/o home. Hardwood floors throughout main, large eat-in kitchen, dedicated dining & living, cedar back porch. Upstairs bedrooms to have freshly installed carpet, skylights & ceiling fans. The basement houses laundry & workshop perfect for DIYers & finished rec/family room. Plenty of storage throughout with an E/W exposure-- plenty of sunlight!


This home sits on a double lot with an expansive fenced side & back yard with two off-street parking spots. A vegetable garden, compost bin & mature trees provide a cozy retreat, especially for those with a green thumb! Home is currently being refreshed-- new paint & carpet will be installed!


Quiet, family-oriented diverse neighborhood. Close to Loyola & North Park campuses. Target is a 5-minute walk away, a 2-minute walk from the impending Peterson Metra stop & CTA #84 stop across the street w/ a short commute to Bryn Mawr Red Line station.

Text2: Fully Furnished! Walk to the best schools in the area!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Enjoy a newly renovated kitchen!

Furnished 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath home in highly-sought after Middleton Hills. Walk to Northside Elementary, the grocery store, and the coffee shop. This nearly 2,000 square foot home is available for a one year lease beginning in January. Perfect for someone looking for a great place to live until interest rates drop. This open concept has a newly renovated kitchen with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an induction stove. Hardwood floors throughout the first floor. Two bedrooms (connected by a full bathroom) and laundry on the second floor. The basement has a large family room, a treadmill, the third bedroom, and a full bath. Enjoy the "loop" out front - a wonderful, family-friendly open area on a super safe street. Plus a large, covered front porch to sit out and enjoy the loop or a deck in the back with a grill and outdoor seating area. Two car unattached garage accessed through the alley.

Tenant will be responsible for utilities, water, mowing, and snow removal. But mowing only takes about 10 minutes. Plug-in mower provided. 

Available fully or partially furnished. No smoking or pets.

Full year lease. Background and credit check required for all applicants. $3,000 security deposit.

Text2: Bright 3 Bd/2 Ba Furnished Unit (Utilities Incl., Free Wi-Fi, Laundry)
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
I have a furnished 3-bedroom/2-bathroom duplex-down unit at my 2-flat walk-up available for rent starting mid-December. The rent is $3,400 and includes...

- Fully furnished living room and dining room
- Large, spacious kitchen with all kitchen essentials, large and small kitchen appliances including a refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, blender, toaster, etc. I can store all small electrics away if you have your own. 
- Utilities Included! FREE high-speed Wi-Fi, water, as well as Netflix and select other services (HBO Max, Paramount+) (livestream gaming that uses large amounts of bandwidth is an upcharge)
- Bedrooms all come with closets, nightstands, lamps and full-size beds with hidden drawers for storage. The master bedroom also has a dresser and huge walk-in closet. Master bedroom has ensuite bathroom shared with one bedroom. Garden bedroom has private bathroom with its own living space, wet bar, microwave and mini-fridge
- FREE LAUNDRY facilities in the unit in the basement with top-of-the-line large-capacity front-loading washer and dryer
- Newly installed backyard fence and deck

The Neighborhood:
There are LOTS of great restaurants, coffee shops, bars, stores, music venues, parks and other attractions in the neighborhood. Bustling and trendy Wicker Park and Bucktown is a 10-minute walk or just 1 stop on the Blue line. Walking distance to 2 grocery stores (Fresh Market and Aldi).

Getting Around:
There is free parking on the streets nearby or you can get parking stickers from the city to park on the street. Western, Armitage and Milwaukee buses are right by the house or the Western blue line stop is less than 5 minutes away. Five stops on the Blue line will take you to the loop for business or recreation in about 15 minutes. Besides the train, there are buses that can help take you anywhere you need. And of course, there are also taxis and Ubers galore.

I can send you a video tour first. If still interested, I can then arrange an in-person viewing. Please note that this unit is located in a 2-unit building, which means please be respectful of your noise levels since others live in the building.

Text2: South Loop Corner Unit 3 Bedroom Penthouse! Walk in Closets, Bright
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 310432883Rent: $3,600 / MonthBeds: 3Bath: 2Pet: Pet Friendly
Price factors in 1 Month free (Must Apply within 48 Hours and be able to move in by 11/30)

Tour: Call/Text Azalia @ 630.853.6340

With its prism-like façade this new 24-story glass apartment tower reflects the increasing trend of luxury high-rise living in the South Loop. Located in the McCormick Square micro-neighborhood, renters of the 275 units here are near the sprawling McCormick Place Convention Center, Illinois Institute of Technology, and DePaul University’s Wintrust Arena.
 
Zip to the Loop in 10 minutes from the CTA Green Line Cermak-McCormick Place station just 1 block away. Drivers also have convenient access to Lake Shore Drive, I-55 and I-90 expressways.  
 
There’s plenty to do around the neighborhood along Cermak Road, as well as adjacent Motor Row, Chinatown, Pilsen and Bronzeville with a growing surge of restaurants, brewery pubs, and entertainment venues. Culture and recreation are also nearby at the Museum Campus, Soldier Field, Northerly Island and the Lakefront Trail.
 
Live a lush life for less with amenities that rival other downtown high-end apartments, but at a more attainable price point compared to other Loop-adjacent neighborhoods such as West Loop, River North and Streeterville. Residents here can enjoy 25,000 square feet of amenity space including a fully-equipped fitness center, yoga studio with virtual trainer, private work spaces, conference room, club lounge with pub room, game/arcade room, sports simulator room, outdoor pool deck with fire pits, grilling stations and private cabanas. Convenient on-site services are also available including dry cleaning lockers, package receiving room, a guest suite, and bike storage.
 
Inside these apartments the warm earth tones welcome you to a soothing home environment. The uniquely styled kitchen finishes feature a mix of hues with European two-tone white and beige cabinetry, marbled light quartz countertops, gray tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. Elements of on-trend exposed concrete ceilings and wide plank wood flooring also create a modern loft look. The floor-to-ceiling windows provide brilliant unobstructed views in all directions. Each unit also includes full-size washers and dryers, premium roller shades and keyless entry.

Text2: Lakeside Living
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
42 Hundred On the Lake offers one- and two-bedrooms apartment homes designed with you in mind.  Well-appointed homes, with modern kitchens featuring stainless French door energy star refrigerators, backless range, elegant quartz countertops and designer tile backsplash.

Our community boasts stunning lake views and resort style amenities which includes infinity edge pool with sun shelves and cabanas.

We offer a variety of community amenities such as:

• The two-level Club Room which features an entertainment kitchen, with a complimentary coffee bar, seating area with stunning lake views, separate dining room with seating for 10 and a Game Room on the main level.
• The Lakeside Lounge where you can enjoy watching sunsets or enjoy a Sunday football game in the Overlook Lounge on the upper level of the Club Room.
• Resort style Pool Courtyard which includes an impressive infinity edge pool with sun shelves and cabanas.
• We have our activity courtyard that will impress your guests with Bocce and Bean Bag Courts, grilling stations, and fire pits; all looking over Lake Michigan and several lounge areas.
• Our 24 hour Fitness Center with state-of-the-art Life Fitness cardio and weight equipment. Along with our Fitness studio that offers a variety of on demand fitness programs.
• The Business Center hosts our work stations, printer, two private meeting rooms and a large conference room.
• We offer indoor, heated, parking in our garage. Also located in the garage is our car wash and electric car charging stations.
• As a pet friendly community, we offer our Fresh Paws Pet Spa, which includes a pet washing station, grooming table and dryer.
• We offer our Pack Concierge system which will provide secured access to your deliveries.
• Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout common areas,
• Convenient access to Bayview and downtown Milwaukee.
• Smoke-free community.
• Professional, on-site, management and maintenance teams.
• 24-hour emergency maintenance

You can view our availability here: https://www.4200onthelakeapartments.com/

Text2: Fabulous Upscale 2 Bedroom River West. Hwd flrs, W/D, Balcony. CTA/94
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 232072913Rent: $3,380 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet FriendlyParking:: attached garage
Lovely newer construction in River West. Modern finishes with all hardwood floors. Balcony, tons of closet space, very close to 94 and CTA Blue line and 66 &56 busses!

Just call or email text with the following info, and I'll be happy to help, thanks!

When is your move date? (is it flexible, if so how far in either direction)?
Any pets (weight and breed)?
Need parking?
Budget(just rent)?
What is your preferred neighborhood(s)?
Have you toured any properties yet? (so that I don't double up on my research)
When are you available for a showing?

Springing up in 2020 along the rapidly-growing Milwaukee Avenue corridor in River West, this newly constructed apartment complex is designed with luxury aesthetics to create an exceptional living environment. Premium quality amenities abound including a cinema lounge with 85” flat-screen, rooftop party room with demo kitchen, grills, and alfresco dining, state-of-the-art fitness center, business center and co-working pods, and an outdoor sun deck with a resort-style pool. The unit stylings reflect the industrial and artistic character found throughout the River West neighborhood with a mix of brick and graffiti murals along with creative high-end furnishings and accessories.

These chic apartments have a mix of exposed loft-style elements along with modern elegant touches.  Each unit is outfitted with luxury finishes including plank wood flooring, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, marbled tile back splash, deep soaking tub, walk-in closets, floor-to-ceiling windows, Nest thermostat, full size in-unit washer and dryer and gas stove.  Select units also include balconies and double sink vanities.

River West is a quieter micro neighborhood that straddles the northwest tip of downtown Chicago and the eastern entrance to the greater West Town cluster of neighborhoods.  Location, location, location is the key appeal to River West, as it is surrounded by other popular neighborhoods including River North, Fulton Market, West Loop, Ukrainian Village and Wicker Park.  It is extremely convenient for commuters being about 10 minutes from the Loop via CTA Blue Line train, 66 Chicago and 56 Milwaukee bus routes, the "Hipster Highway" protected bike lanes on Milwaukee Ave, or car. CTA Blue line train station and bus stops are a 1 block walk from your front door.  Drivers will also love that access to I-94 is right across the street for northbound destinations, and the southbound ramp is also less than 5 minutes away.

Enjoy a quick stroll to local eateries such as Windy City Cafe, Pie-Eyed Pizza, D'Agostino's, Twisted Spoke, Opart Thai House, Piccolo Sogno, Maillard Tavern, and The Dawson. Grabbing a cup of joe could not be easier with Big Shoulders Coffee and Dunkin Donuts just around the corner. The beloved neighborhood watering hole is right next door at The Matchbox, and it is one of the most unique in the city as it may be the smallest bar in Chicago, but there is plenty of outdoor seating along side an actual vintage train car.  Wandering down Chicago Ave, Milwaukee Ave. or Grand Ave. you'll stumble upon art galleries, independent boutique shops, craft brew pubs, wine bars and diverse cuisine throughout the neighborhood that make River West a cozy pocket of Chicago with lots of character. Daily essentials are also close by at CVS, Jewel-Osco, and BWS Beverage.

Convenient services accommodate your daily needs on-site too including a front desk concierge, 24-hour maintenance and property management, package service, and a coffee bar.  Parking garage is available with additional fees. Cats and dogs are welcome (with some restrictions) with a dog run and pet washing station on site to keep your fur babies active and clean.

Text2: Fabulous Palisades - On IC's Northside
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This beautifully hidden neighborhood is nestled in the trees & perfectly placed on IC's Northside. Close to shopping, restaurants, U of I, hospitals, I-80 and all that is the Northside. This elegant 2 story has had some amazing work done since it was first built. Exterior colors transformation, interior oak wood floors re-stained and finished, a wall taken out of the main floor for open concept kitchen, dining, & new fireplace with designer stone make for a great sitting space. All new paint interior, backsplash in kitchen, lights and many more wonderful additions. Quartz tops throughout. Upper level features spacious bedrooms including a 19' x 15' primary suite, large walk in closet, and laundry room. The primary bath has custom backsplash. Lower level has family room with entertainment bar and 4th bedroom. This beautiful home offers LED lighting throughout, HERS energy rating, Anderson Windows, LP siding, Whole Home Humidifier, Hellenbrand Reverse Osmosis and Millenium whole house water filter/softener (owned). Back up water powered sump pump. Custom blinds stay with the home.

Text2: Mukwonago: 4,548sq ft, 5br, 3.5bath, 3 car, for rent
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Remarkable home for rent.

Setting on a 2 acre gorgeous lot in the Town of Eagle, Mukwonago School District! Spacious interior that includes over 4,500 sq ft of living space with the beautifully finished lower level. Home has 5BR/3.5BA. Vaulted ceilings throughout. Living room fireplace (convertible, between fire and gas). Sun room with walls of windows, with sliding door. Large kitchen and dining area. Additional formal dining room. 

First floor master bedroom includes 2 closets and private bath (jacuzzi tub). Open staircase leads to 3 BR's (one of the bedrooms is the size of a master and has 2 closets), loft, and full bath on the upper level.  Lower level includes family room with bar, exercise room (exercise equipment can stay with rental), den, 5th bedroom, and full bath, small storage room. There are 2 exposed windows in the basement, one for the bedroom and the other for living/recreational area. 

3-car attached garage. Large deck.  Attached are a few pictures.
If interested, text or e-mail.  6O2-38O-258O

$4,000 per month.

1 month refundable deposit required.  Must have proof of income that rent can be covered each month.  Must have decent credit score.  Background check is performed.  0 tolerance for drugs.

The pictures listed above, are just a sample, and do not show all rooms.

Text2: Sunny Lincoln Park Townhome for rent, no rent increase since 2020!
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
3 bedroom/3 full bathrooms with finished basement 

Available to rent asap 11/2/2022 

RENT HAS NOT INCREASED SINCE 2020! $3700/month 

First floor features floor to ceiling windows with privacy curtains. Tons of light in this end unit, windows on 3 sides of the walls. Beautiful wood floors. Family rooms on first and second floor. Spacious kitchen with plenty of storage, built in microwave, dishwasher, new fridge with ice and filtered water. 

Second floor features 2 bedrooms with huge closets, tons of light and full bathroom with marble tops. 

Master suite is on the top floor and features a huge walk-in closet, fireplace and deck off of the bedroom. The bathroom has a large shower and separate tub, his and her sinks and marble finishes throughout. 

Basement is finished with full bathroom for guests. Also includes a dry bar including marbletop laundry room, built in wine fridge. 

This is a beautiful home. Tons of light, in a terrific neighborhood. Walking distance to restaurants, bars, parks. Very close to DePaul. Near Ashland but not on Ashland so feels private and local. In the Prescott school district. Amazing neighbors that look out for each other. 

1 car garage with plenty of storage and tandem parking for a 2nd card

This is a posting for sublet through January with option to continue the lease through July 2023.

Text2: 3 bed/3 bath Townhouse - Southport Corridor
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Bright and sunny south facing townhouse for rent in the heart of the Southport Corridor and one block from Blaine School District. The main floor has an open floor plan with hardwood floors features a kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and plenty of cabinets. The primary bedroom features vaulted ceilings, a large walk-in closet and ensuite bath. Top floor includes additional bedroom and additional bath. The lower level features a spacious family room with fireplace, separate laundry room, and the third bedroom and third bath. On top of this beautiful home is a rooftop deck and there is a nice back yard as well along with one parking space. Lots of storage. One block to Juniper Park. Close to Jewel, Whole Foods, Music Box Theater and to all of the shops, cafes and restaurants along Southport. Four blocks to Wrigley Field, four blocks to the Southport Brown Line.

Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The description for this home is in the second paragraph, but for clarity, this is a rent/lease option program. You are allowed to stay up to 5 years, but only have to agree to a one year lease. You may purchase the home at anytime, if you so choose. This is a 45-60 day process once we have secured the home you chose. Our office has conducted over 80 transactions with this investment firm, so if you are NOT working with an agent, please contact me with your name and email address, and or phone number, and I will email you an invite to the program so you can navigate, and see if this program is for you. This is not a listing of Re/Max Premiere Realty, but when you send me your information, I will email you an invite to the program where you can register and see this house and others.

* There also is another program which is more based on income, assets, and debt ratio vs. a credit score, and includes the entire St. Louis Metro area.

UTILIZE THIS PROGRAM TO LEASE AND/OR BUY IN THE FUTURE THIS Much larger than it looks! Absolutely darling 1.5 story brick home nestled on picturesque Julian Place. All the charm but full of updates for todays busy lifestyle. Kitchen was remodeled & gained more square footage in '18 by adding to the back of the home to provide the new buyer with the ultimate kitchen that gives the open concept living to the dining room. 42" white cabinets, gorgeous quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances to include gas 5 burner range, microwave, dishwasher and refrigerator. Belly up to the peninsula bar and enjoy the views out the kitchen window to the fenced backyard, patio and garage. Hardwood floors flow in the entire first floor. Inviting sun-filled living room features a gas fireplace with mantle. Main floor primary bedroom is living large 14x12. Both bathrooms have been updated. Upstairs are 2 nice size bedrooms, walk-in closet, 2nd bath & loft area perfect for a play room/office. Finished rec room in the lower level.

It’s a great option if you:
• Want to live in a single-family home, in a great community with quality schools
• Are a first-time homebuyer who’s cautious about buying a home now, but may want to buy in the future
• Are a home seeker in the process of relocating but aren’t sure where you want to settle down
• Can’t obtain a mortgage right now
Contact me today for more information and details about the program

Rehabbed four bedroom, three full bath with tons of living space. Built-in bookshelves surround a beautiful decorative fireplace in the spacious living room. The kitchen boasts newer appliances, granite counter-tops, including a dishwasher and cherry wood cabinetry, and a large separate dining room. The three full bathrooms are cleanly remodeled with ceramic tile. Large bedrooms easily accommodate any size bed, and have plenty of closet space. The gleaming hardwood floors and high ceilings add to the openness of this apartment.

This beautiful recently gut rehabbed building is tucked away on a quiet tree lined street, yet is located in the heart of Lakeview. Belmont Avenue (two blocks north) has a number of local boutiques and charming restaurants as well as a CTA El train stop which services the Red Line, Brown Line, and Purple Line Express. Halsted and Clark Streets also have a variety of dining and entertainment options including bars and several theaters. Chicago’s lakefront is located just four blocks east, featuring tons of outdoor activities including biking, running, golf, tennis, baseball, and swimming in Lake Michigan. Conveniently, the #22 Clark street bus stop is located less than a block away its route goes downtown all night. Parking is available at this location.

ASK ME ABOUT OTHER GREAT FLOOR PLANS AVAILABLE IN THIS BUILDING!


Neighborhood: Pilsen
Cross Streets: W. 15th St. and S. Laflin St.


This historic site offers sought after interiors such as exposed brick, timber beams, and oversized windows. An expansive roof deck overlooks Pilsen with grills, multiple seating options, as well as an indoor kitchenette. The building was the historical location of an Otis elevator company factory.

Part of the lower west side of Chicago, Pilsen has long been associated with immigrant groups to the city who have defined its culture. It is known for street art such as murals connected to Mayan and Aztec cultures which have influenced Mexican artists which can be seen along the Metra tracks and as a part of the 18th Street Pink Line CTA station. Bars and restaurants on 18th Street, as well as the renovated Thalia Hall music venue, offer plenty of nightlife and entertainment.


***UNIT DOES NOT COME FURNISHED AND IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR SHORT-TERM LEASES***

Welcome to urban modern living-just like the West Loop itself! Located at the west end of the West Loop, this trendy boutique mid-rise manages a neighborhood feel while sitting on the edge of downtown. Take an easy walk to Mariano’s Fresh Market and Whole Foods, lots of independent retailers and several parks in the neighborhood. Only two blocks away you’ll find Randolph Street, where you can dine at some of the city’s finest and most famous restaurants, like Girl and the Goat, Au Cheval and Nellcote. The dining and bar options in this area are just spectacular. Transportation into and out of the city is super easy, with close CTA Blue, Pink and Green Lines as well as I-90/94 and 294 access. On-site social spaces include a resident lounge, state-of-the-art movie screening room, computer lab and 24-hour gym. The property is 100% smoke-free and uses a fob security system.

Large open living spaces highlight these modern, tasteful residences, showcased by 10’ ceilings, oversized windows and plank flooring. Premium cabinets, stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops mark the kitchen areas, which also include undermount sinks and gas stoves. In-unit washers and dryers and resident-controlled heating and air conditioning are also standard. Private patios, balconies or Juliet balconies are offered in select units. 

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats and dogs are accepted throughout (dog breed restrictions apply, but there is no weight limit). There is no dog run on-site, but you have a whole park only one block away!

***ONE MONTH FREE***

This three story coach house is one stand-alone unit with six bedrooms, four full baths and plenty of common living space. The apartment has a large living room and kitchen, the kitchen comes complete with a built in granite island and granite counter-tops. The kitchen also has plenty of cabinet space and a dishwasher. Tenant controlled central air conditioning and gas forced heat are also convenient aspects of this unit. There are laundry facilities in the building.

This wonderful Victorian building is tucked away on a quiet tree lined street, yet is in the very heart of Lakeview, steps from Halsted and Clark Streets. Belmont Avenue, which is just a block north, has a number of local boutiques and charming restaurants as well as the CTA El stop with connections to the Red, Brown, and Purple Express Lines. Surrounding major streets also have a variety of dining and entertainment options including several theaters. Lake Shore Drive and Chicago’s lakefront are located two blocks east. This provides easy commuter transportation as well as a number of outdoor activities including biking, running, golf, and lounging on the beach. The #22 Clark street bus stop is less than a block away and offers a quick route to downtown all night long.

Text2: 2 Bedroom 2 bath, W/D in unit, Rooftop Pool, near 90/94 &Target
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 33400645Rent: $3,140 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet FriendlyParking:: attached garage
When is your move date?(is it flexible, if so how far in either direction)?
Any pets(weight and breed)?
Need parking?
Budget(just rent)?
What is your preferred neighborhood(s)?
Have you toured any properties yet?(so that I don't double up on my research)
When are you available for a showing?

When it comes to blending the work hard/play hard lifestyle, few properties do a better job than this one. With easy expressway access for commuters, and a straight shot into The Loop, getting to work is a breeze. For stay-at-home workers, you’ll find a neighborhood vibe only minutes outside of the downtown scene. In either case, this “we-thought-of-everything” building offers world-class amenities, starting with their 360-degree rooftop pool deck that covers more than a half acre! Lounge seating, private grilling stations and a fire pit are all part of the experience. There is also an outdoor yoga studio. Moving indoors, you’ll find a full fitness center, resident party room, game room with billiards table and technology lounge with complimentary coffee bar. The building is 100% smoke-free and has a 24-hour door staff.

These apartment homes are urban living at its finest. Expect to find floor-to-ceiling windows, wide plank flooring, full-size washers and dryers and gourmet kitchens. No details were spared with the white quartz countertops, mosaic tile backsplashes and quiet close cabinetry. All of this, plus oversized closets and resident-controlled heat and air conditioning. Some units have balconies.

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats and dogs are accepted throughout and there is a dog run for your four-legged friend (dog breed restrictions apply, but there is no weight limit).

For fastest response, please call or text Molly at 312-805-6567!

A truly modern loft-style apartment, this property is perfectly situated to take advantage of everything the South Loop offers. With easy access to all of the main expressways, and a 5-minute walk to the Red, Orange and Green Lines (Roosevelt CTA), you have easy commuter access as well as a short walk to Grant Park and the lake. A beautiful sky garden with fire pit and grilling stations, on-site dry cleaning, and private fitness center highlight some of the building’s convenient amenities. This building is 100% smoke-free.

With floor-to-ceiling windows throughout, these apartments feature large main living spaces and extra large closets. The modern, newly renovated loft-style units offer either hardwood or polished concrete flooring, in-unit washers and dryers and granite countertops in the kitchens. Some units include lofted bedrooms. These unique layouts are fresh and contemporary with stunning views and well-designed, liveable space. All units have central air and some include balconies. 

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats are accepted throughout and dogs are welcome on select floors (dog breed restrictions apply, but there is no weight limit). There is a dog run for your four-legged friend!

QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Spacious Penthouse occupies entire extra wide 2nd story in boutique elevator building. Elevator opens into unit's mudroom. Minutes walk to blue line, 606 , downtown Wicker Park/Bucktown, Logan/Palmer Square. Video security system for building. Additional security system in unit. 3 large private decks + shared rooftop deck. Custom drapes, gas fireplace, gourmet kitchen, granite counter tops, SS appliances, 52 bottle wine fridge. Large 2nd and 3rd BRs- both with separate private decks, built-in closets, Large 2nd BA w/ mosaic tiled Jacuzzi tub/shower. In Unit W/D. RARE 2 car attached/secure/private Garage parking incl with additional gated private drive into garage. This apartment is truly immaculate w unique finishes throughout. Very rare secured 2 car garage. Rented to same tenant for past 4+ years. The neighbors are wonderful. The location is beyond convenient. Blue line, coffee, grocer, fitness, bars, restaurants and shops all within blocks. Only 5 min drive to expressways (90/94/290).

All freshly painted with hardwood floors on the main floor and comfy carpet downstairs. 5 bedrooms gives you space to work at home, entertain family and friends for extended time. Kitchen is newly remodeled with white cabinets, quartz countertops, a new microwave and a Bosch dishwasher. Filtered water dispenser included, and a beautiful farm sink makes for a chef's dream. 

In unit laundry as well as a workout room enhance the list of desirable amenities. The living room and the family room both have fireplaces for the snowy winter nights. 

The convenience of living in a duplex condo with plenty of space and still having the proximity of the highlights of Pilsen cannot be beat.

Public transportation is very easy to access. 18th Street is a step away and allows you to walk to excellent restaurants, ice cream, coffee shops, the library and cute boutiques. The lake and downtown are within a 10 min. drive and easy to bike to as well. 

Security Deposit $3000
$50 application fee per renter

Text2: Impressive River North 2 Bedroom! Walk-In Custom Closets, CTA, Gym
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 17076061Rent: $3,400 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet Friendly
 For Quickest Response, Call/Text Azalia at 630.853.6340 

This recent addition to the River North neighborhood has set the bar for high-rise living extremely high! You’ll know you’re at a next level type of property from the moment you enter the impressive lobby. A vast array of amenities includes a media theater with surround sound, a state-of-the-art fitness center with sauna and steam room, a gorgeous outdoor pool deck with grills, and much more. For those times when you must venture off-site for work or play, you’re looking at a short walk to the CTA Brown, Purple and Red Lines and just about a minute in the car to hop on I 90/94. Walk to some of the city’s most popular nightlife spots just a couple of blocks to the east, and then return home to your slightly quieter corner of River North. There is 24-hour door staff to welcome you to this 100% smoke-free property.

Upon entering these apartments, you’ll notice efficient floor plans with generous closet space and high ceilings. Hardwood flooring is standard in the living spaces (the bedrooms are carpeted) and each unit has a washer and dryer. Kitchens boast quartz countertops with a glass and stone backsplash along with designer Italian cabinetry. Last but not least, this building has a 4-pipe heating and cooling system, meaning that you can individually run your heat or AC on demand (regardless of season).

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats are accepted throughout and dogs are welcome on almost every floor (dog breed restrictions apply). There is a dog run on-site, and you’ll find a larger dog park just two blocks away.

This beautiful home has parlor and formal dining room at the entry, opening to a two story grand room with great natural light. Two-sided fireplace between the living room and kitchenette area divides the space. Spacious kitchen with solid surface countertops. One main level office or bedroom.

The upper level has 4 bedrooms including a 17×13 master bedroom serviced by 3 full baths. Master bath features a shower, jetted tub and a double vanity.

The finished lower level has a spacious rec room featuring a bar with cherry cabinets. Additional full bath and a dining/billiards room are also on this level.

Outside, there is a 3 car garage, back deck and a back patio.

Sorry no dogs.

Text3:

Available Now.

5 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom, beautiful brick huge townhouse in very quiet Shorewood neighborhood. A few blocks from Shorewood schools and 2 blocks from UWM. About 2,700 square foot. Hardwood floors throughout, mostly newly refinished. Leaded glass windows with storms and screens throughout.

Master bedroom (15'5" x 13'2") with master bath plus huge storage area on the third floor. 

Bedroom1 and 2 are 11'75" x 15'3"; bedroom 3 (11'10" x 11'10"), bedroom 4 (11'9" x 7'7") with a walk-in cedar closet, and two full bathrooms on the second floor. 

Living room (27'3" x 15'5") with built-in bookshelves, dining room with leaded glass china cabinets, breakfast nook, kitchen with brand new granite countertops and Bosch (super quiet) dishwasher, brand new strove and refrigerator, and half bath on the first floor. 

Finished huge rec room (30'4"x 14'4") and laundry room with washer and dryer in the basement. 

One garage spot and two parking spaces. A/C newly installed. Radiator heat. 

Water, sewer, and garbage are included. Additional huge storage rooms in attic and basement. All appliances are included. No smoking, small pets negotiable. One-year minimum lease. Two year preferred.

Option: furnished pay additional $800 /month
Small Pets are negotiable. 

Location: 
To Shorewood High & Elementary School: walk 5 minutes, drive 2-3 minutes 
To UWM: walk 5 minutes, drive 2 minutes

A truly modern loft-style apartment, this property is perfectly situated to take advantage of everything the South Loop offers. With easy access to all of the main expressways, and a 5-minute walk to the Red, Orange and Green Lines (Roosevelt CTA), you have easy commuter access as well as a short walk to Grant Park and the lake. A beautiful sky garden with fire pit and grilling stations, on-site dry cleaning, and private fitness center highlight some of the building’s convenient amenities. This building is 100% smoke-free.

With floor-to-ceiling windows throughout, these apartments feature large main living spaces and extra large closets. The modern, newly renovated loft-style units offer either hardwood or polished concrete flooring, in-unit washers and dryers and granite countertops in the kitchens. Some units include lofted bedrooms. These unique layouts are fresh and contemporary with stunning views and well-designed, liveable space. All units have central air and some include balconies. 

Parking is available on-site at an additional charge. Cats are accepted throughout and dogs are welcome on select floors (dog breed restrictions apply, but there is no weight limit). There is a dog run for your four-legged friend!

Text2: Fabulous Upscale 2 Bedroom River West. Hwd flrs, W/D, Balcony. CTA/94
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PROPERTY INFO
ID: 232072913Rent: $3,588 / MonthBeds: 2Bath: 2Pet: Pet FriendlyParking:: attached garage
Lovely newer construction in River West. Modern finishes with all hardwood floors. Balcony, tons of closet space, very close to 94 and CTA Blue line and 66 &56 busses!

Just call or email text with the following info, and I'll be happy to help, thanks!

When is your move date? (is it flexible, if so how far in either direction)?
Any pets (weight and breed)?
Need parking?
Budget(just rent)?
What is your preferred neighborhood(s)?
Have you toured any properties yet? (so that I don't double up on my research)
When are you available for a showing?

Springing up in 2020 along the rapidly-growing Milwaukee Avenue corridor in River West, this newly constructed apartment complex is designed with luxury aesthetics to create an exceptional living environment. Premium quality amenities abound including a cinema lounge with 85” flat-screen, rooftop party room with demo kitchen, grills, and alfresco dining, state-of-the-art fitness center, business center and co-working pods, and an outdoor sun deck with a resort-style pool. The unit stylings reflect the industrial and artistic character found throughout the River West neighborhood with a mix of brick and graffiti murals along with creative high-end furnishings and accessories.

These chic apartments have a mix of exposed loft-style elements along with modern elegant touches.  Each unit is outfitted with luxury finishes including plank wood flooring, stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, marbled tile back splash, deep soaking tub, walk-in closets, floor-to-ceiling windows, Nest thermostat, full size in-unit washer and dryer and gas stove.  Select units also include balconies and double sink vanities.

River West is a quieter micro neighborhood that straddles the northwest tip of downtown Chicago and the eastern entrance to the greater West Town cluster of neighborhoods.  Location, location, location is the key appeal to River West, as it is surrounded by other popular neighborhoods including River North, Fulton Market, West Loop, Ukrainian Village and Wicker Park.  It is extremely convenient for commuters being about 10 minutes from the Loop via CTA Blue Line train, 66 Chicago and 56 Milwaukee bus routes, the "Hipster Highway" protected bike lanes on Milwaukee Ave, or car. CTA Blue line train station and bus stops are a 1 block walk from your front door.  Drivers will also love that access to I-94 is right across the street for northbound destinations, and the southbound ramp is also less than 5 minutes away.

Enjoy a quick stroll to local eateries such as Windy City Cafe, Pie-Eyed Pizza, D'Agostino's, Twisted Spoke, Opart Thai House, Piccolo Sogno, Maillard Tavern, and The Dawson. Grabbing a cup of joe could not be easier with Big Shoulders Coffee and Dunkin Donuts just around the corner. The beloved neighborhood watering hole is right next door at The Matchbox, and it is one of the most unique in the city as it may be the smallest bar in Chicago, but there is plenty of outdoor seating along side an actual vintage train car.  Wandering down Chicago Ave, Milwaukee Ave. or Grand Ave. you'll stumble upon art galleries, independent boutique shops, craft brew pubs, wine bars and diverse cuisine throughout the neighborhood that make River West a cozy pocket of Chicago with lots of character. Daily essentials are also close by at CVS, Jewel-Osco, and BWS Beverage.

Convenient services accommodate your daily needs on-site too including a front desk concierge, 24-hour maintenance and property management, package service, and a coffee bar.  Parking garage is available with additional fees. Cats and dogs are welcome (with some restrictions) with a dog run and pet washing station on site to keep your fur babies active and clean.
