Text2: Oregon at South Water Works #606 Penthouse 3b 3ba with 2 Balconies
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
3 Bedroom 3 Bath Penthouse with large fireplace and two balconies! Amazing city views!
Unit #606 1914 square feet

Now offering 2 months free on a signed 18 month lease! Limited time.

Find your perfect home!

Welcome to The Oregon Apartments, the newest addition to the South Water Works community. This diverse collection of apartments are known for their contemporary feel and historic charm. Situated in a convenient energetic and prestigious location.

We believe that true luxury can be found in the details. Every single apartment in The Oregon at South Water Works has been carefully crafted with you in mind. When you live here, you’ll experience a range of beautiful amenities. Kitchens boast granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and kitchen Islands with breakfast bar seating. You’ll find hardwood floors, oversized master baths with waterfall shower heads, spacious walk-in closets, and private balconies or patio. The large windows expose scenic city views of the neighborhood and river.

With a variety of communal activities; Fitness center, sun deck, terrace with fire pit, and more. You will feel right at home in this exceptional community. The Oregon has a wide variety of spacious floor plan options from one, two, and three bedrooms and baths. This penthouse unit reserves 2 indoor heated parking spots for an extra fee at lease signing only.   Electric car charging stations are also available.

PET FRIENDLY COMMUNITY
The Oregon Apartments are pet friendly. Our central courtyard is ideal for a quick walk with your pet or take a stroll to the numerous cafes and shops that surround our properties.

LUXURY FINISHES
Granite countertops
Stainless steel appliances
Kitchen islands with countertop seating
Contemporary lighting
Hardwood floors
Individual climate control
Oversized master bath showers with waterfall shower heads
Spacious walk-in closets
In-unit washer and dryer
Private balconies and patio
River and downtown views

COMMUNITY AMMENITIES
Oversized Windows
Indoor heated parking *Gated surface parking
Sun rooftop Deck with outdoor seating
Terrace with Fire pit and grilling area
Wooded natural central courtyard
Storage lockers and bike storage
Controlled access entry
On-site management

Text2: Mapleton-Fall Creek Rental
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Stunning renovation in Mapleton/Fall Creek! So many original features remain while beautifully blended with high end updates. Original wood craftsmanship includes the handsome staircase, flooring, doors, window trim, moldings, and fireplace mantel. Elegant modern kitchen has two-toned cabinets, a large island, and new appliances. Upstairs the primary bedroom now has an en suite bathroom for added privacy and convenience. The basement has been partially finished, has daylight windows, and is plumbed for a bathroom. Other updates include all electrical, new A/C, all exterior siding, water heater, garage door and opener, gas log fireplace, and lighting. See the supplements for the full list of updates and finishes.

Text2: Mobile Home for sale $25,000
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Single-wide mobile home for sale located in Five Seasons Davenport. The home is located on a corner lot which provides plenty of space for parking as well as large yard space.

Brand new metal roofing was installed last summer. Brand new laminate wood flooring was installed this summer and the windows were replaced a couple of years ago.

The home has a central air unit and will leave the stove, fridge, washer, and dryer(all functional and in good condition) for no extra charge if desired.

Text2: Lake House for Rent 3 bed 3 bath
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Rare waterfront, remodeled home on beautiful Lake Waubesa. Open kitchen and main living area with wood burning fireplace. 3 Bedrooms including new primary suite with large spa style shower. 3 full baths (one is also laundry room). Additional room with queen size murphy bed for office/guest room. Large private pier with stairs to the sandy bottom. End of a quiet court. Attached 2 car garage with large attic for storage. Shed has attached chicken run if you would like to have chickens! Gorgeous sun and moon rises, great location for swimming, fishing, water sports, and enjoying lake life. New appliances and most mechanicals including infloor radiant heat throughout. Large side yard. Minutes from the Beltline, but feels like you are up north.   Pier installation/removal, lawncare, and snow removal provided by owner.

Text2: Brandan Burger
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Please beware of your new landlord and insure you have contingencies in place for your family if you pass away while you are renting from Brandan Burger. This landlord will claim all your property and help himself to all your possessions stating that you abandoned it because your dead. Your family will then need to obtain a lawyer just to get back a limited number of items after Brandan Burger has sold, kept, or thrown away what he wants. 
His last tenant passed away April 2nd and after four months we finally have whatever Brandan Burger deemed acceptable to him to return. However, he provided zero explanation to what happened to all the tenant’s belongings. Shockingly apparently his last tenant did not own any bed to sleep on, no pots/pans/dishes/silverware, zero shirts, jeans, socks, underwear, shoes, towels, bedding (guess if no bed you do not need that) or normal every household necessities. You get the point I am making. 
We tried to accommodate Brandan Burger to remove the property and clean, however after driving 3 hours one way Brandan Burger determined that weekend just would not work for him. He advised that we could pick up a small tote of personal things like the tenant’s mail, medicine, and part our ways because Brandan Burger said everything else, he now owned. 
Brandan Burger maliciously caused additional pain, stress, and hardship to our family with zero legal justification or cause. Brandan Burger is a prime example of what is wrong with today’s society. The only thing Brandan Burger accomplished was a twisted boost to his small man complex. Brandan Burger is the scum of Middleton WI.
People reading this should be appalled by Brandan Burgers actions and hopefully treat him the way he deserves. I wish Brandan Burger a horrible existence, may all terrible things he has caused/done to others come back on Brandan Burger tenfold.

Text2: Host home for Intellectually Disabled adult
Text3:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Opening available in a Freeport indepedent group home, a host home, for an intellectually disabled adult person. Must be Medicaid waiver approved and on the PUNS list. A host home is a more private, 2 person group home for those who are able to be more active in the community and in need of more personal attention and supervision, rather than being placed in a large group home. Licenced by DHS State of Illinois. If you know of an individual turned away by other agencies due to no openings available, this may be your answer. The Host Home program in Illinois is relatively new, and allows an intellectually disabled adult more freedom, daily outings, to possibly have a pet, and have more say in their meal choices, and top quality food provided. I am licensed with a four year degree and many years experience in caring for individuals. Beautiful home on a half-acre near Krape Park.

Text3:

Beautiful furnished country home for rent 
located between Port Washington and Belgium, but in the Northern Ozaukee 
School district. 
Home can be rented on a month to month basis, or a 3 or 6 month lease, longer lease term my be available as well. 
Home is furnished. Lawn care, and ALL utilities as well as garbage service included in rent. Home includes all
appliances.
Huge yard with plenty of room to enjoy nature included. 
Rent is 3200.00 per month, plus a 1500.00security deposit at lease signing. 
Pet policy: 1 dog and 1 cat allowed, monthly rent will increase to 3400.00 with pets. 
Requirements for rental: 
1. Criminal background and CCAP checks 
on all adults over 18 in the home. Absolutely NO felony convictions and no misdemeanor convictions in the last 5 years; no currently pending criminal cases. 
2. No vouchers of any kind accepted
3. Employment and income verification.. must have provable pre-tax income of at least twice the monthly rent.
4. No more than two people signed on the lease 
5. No history of evictions
6. No smoking inside house
